ValidationRule.description: For Challenge components, except Subscribe, Actual or History, check if the lookup is filled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISBLANK( FieloCH__Challenge__c ), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ChallengeDetail', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ChallengeRewards', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ChallengeMissions', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ChallengeLeaderboard') )
